lines.name: Southbound

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (30-72) to (44-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-25) to maximum Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (1-4)% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (15-75) Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Victario's Charity

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-16)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% chance to grant a Power Charge to nearby Allies on Kill
5% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Hit

lines.flavourText: A man's life is the greatest gift he can give.

lines.name: Victario's Influence

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (1-30) Generosity
Socketed Gems have (20-30)% reduced Mana Reservation
Socketed Gems have (20-45)% increased Reservation Efficiency
(10-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Baron

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies per (300-500) Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, (1.5-2)% of Damage dealt by your Raised Zombies is Leeched to you as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who 
practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

lines.name: The Eternal Apple

implicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill when you lose Endurance Charges
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Trolltimber Spire

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage Leeched as Life for Skills used by Totems
15% increased Area of Effect for Skills used by Totems
0.5% of Damage dealt by your Totems is Leeched to you as Life
You and your Totems Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second for each Summoned Totem

lines.flavourText:
The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end, 
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

lines.name: Wreath of Phrecia

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Area of Effect at 50% of their value
Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Damage

lines.flavourText: The Light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

implicitModifiers.text: (5-15)% increased Spell Damage
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased Effect of Auras on you
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on you
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Auras on your Minions
10% increased Effect of Aura Buffs on your Minions
(10-20)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: Lycosidae

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to maximum Life
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Retaliation Skills
Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Counterattacks

lines.flavourText: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Resolve

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

lines.name: Asphyxia's Wrath

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Projectile Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
40% reduced Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Hexes on Slain Enemies are transferred to a nearby Enemy
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies in a range of 30 when Hexed Enemy dies
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Stormseeker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Effect of Chills you inflict while Leeching Mana
(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield
Unaffected by Chill while Leeching Mana
Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

lines.name: Stormcharger

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

lines.name: Alberon's Warpath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks
Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you

Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you
Summon Skeletons cannot Summon more than 1 Skeleton Warrior

lines.flavourText:
Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

lines.name: Flesh and Spirit

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Kills grant an additional Vaal Soul if you have Rampaged Recently

lines.flavourText:
What is greed but trading a mountain of death
for a sliver of life?

lines.name: Gang's Momentum

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-40)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText: Become one with the unstoppable flame.

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-100)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects (10-100) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (5-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Lochtonial Caress

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

lines.name: Victario's Flight

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
(10-30)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
(5-10)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
10% increased Movement Speed for you and nearby Allies
Quicksilver Flasks you Use also apply to nearby Allies

lines.flavourText:
Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

lines.name: Wanderlust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Oskarm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Assassin's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Trigger Level 10 Assassin's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
Curse Enemies with Level 10 Assassin's Mark on Hit
2% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance per 200 Accuracy Rating

lines.flavourText:
Land and sea did not dissuade,
nor did the Kelpie's maw;
the wild beast crossed half the world
to sate his hungry claw.

lines.name: Kahuturoa's Certainty
lines.flavourText: Confidence is calm and measured.

lines.name: Skullhead

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Minions have +(10-25)% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions Recover 10% of their Life when they Block
Minions Regenerate 2% of Life per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects (10-30) Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
(25-100)% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Shadows and Dust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

lines.name: Snakebite

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
While at maximum Frenzy Charges, Attacks Poison Enemies
+5% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Titucius' Span

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-28) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: -(80-10) Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks
+25% Chance to Block Projectile Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-5) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
1 to 4 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 6 to 10 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 6 to 10 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Goldrim

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Fire Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
+(150-1000) to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Wheel of the Stormsail

implicitModifiers.text: 60% increased Block Recovery

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you
Curse Skills have (25-100)% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.

lines.name: Dusktoe

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (15-40) to (25-60) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A lick of shadow may ease 
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Deidbell

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Skills which Exert an Attack have (20-40)% chance to not count that Attack
Cannot Leech when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: May you never hear it toll.

lines.name: Asenath's Gentle Touch

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Temporal Chains on Hit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit, with 40% increased Effect
Non-Aura Curses you inflict are not removed from Dying Enemies

Enemies near corpses affected by your Curses are Blinded
Enemies Killed near corpses affected by your Curses explode, dealing
3% of their Life as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: Cool the head and cool the blade.

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: The Deep One's Hide

implicitModifiers.text: 60% increased Block Recovery

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds (4-12) to (8-15) Cold Damage to Attacks
Curse Enemies with Level 5 Vulnerability on Block
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block, with 20% increased Effect
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText:
The thicker the shell,
the greater the beast that hunts it.

lines.name: The Embalmer

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

lines.flavourText:
"Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."
